column4: anyone with any information on the new xorg and its xorg.conf file?
erm, you probably want to start at: wiki.ubuntu.com/X
did you read the parent site I linked you to?

adding additional displays has not changed by the way.  That's still done in xorg.conf.  The input devices have been handed off to HAL and you configure that with fdi files (if you want to turn this off, grep man xorg.conf for HAL)
